keel.Algorithms.SVM.SMO.supportVector

Class RegOptimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.SVM.SMO.supportVector.RegOptimizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, OptionHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RegSMO

    public class RegOptimizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements OptionHandler, java.io.Serializable
    Base class implementation for learning algorithm of SVMreg Valid options are: 

     -L <double>
  The epsilon parameter in epsilon-insensitive loss function.
  (default 1.0e-3)
     -W <double>
  The random number seed.
  (default 1)
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    Remco Bouckaert (remco@cs.waikato.ac.nz,rrb@xm.co.nz)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setOptions

        public void setOptions(java.lang.String[] options)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Parses a given list of options.

        Valid options are: 

         -L <double>
  The epsilon parameter in epsilon-insensitive loss function.
  (default 1.0e-3)
         -W <double>
  The random number seed.
  (default 1)
        Specified by:
        setOptions in interface OptionHandler
        Parameters:
        options - the list of options as an array of strings
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an option is not supported
